statements: SELECT * FROM UserReportedContent WHERE reporter_id = 123;
SELECT report_id, post_id, report_reason FROM UserReportedContent WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserReportedContent WHERE action_taken IS NOT NULL;
SELECT post_id, report_reason FROM UserReportedContent WHERE reporter_id = 456 ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT reporter_id FROM UserReportedContent WHERE report_reason = 'Spam';
SELECT report_id, post_id, report_reason FROM UserReportedContent WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserReportedContent WHERE report_reason LIKE '%spam%' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, reporter_id, action_taken FROM UserReportedContent WHERE action_taken IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT reporter_id, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM UserReportedContent GROUP BY reporter_id HAVING COUNT(report_id) > 1;
SELECT report_id, post_id, reporter_id, report_reason, report_date, action_taken FROM UserReportedContent WHERE action_taken IN ('deleted', 'banned') ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT report_id, report_reason FROM reports WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT report_id, report_reason, report_status FROM reports WHERE user_id = 456 AND report_status = 'pending';
SELECT report_id, report_status FROM reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT action_id, action_type, action_date FROM actions WHERE report_id = 789 ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT report_id, report_reason FROM reports WHERE report_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT report_id, action_type, action_description FROM reports INNER JOIN actions ON reports.report_id = actions.report_id WHERE actions.action_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM reports GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_reports > 1;
SELECT report_id, action_type, action_date FROM actions ORDER BY action_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT report_id, user_id, report_reason FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_id FROM reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_content FROM posts WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, action_type, action_date FROM actions WHERE action_type = 'resolved';
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_id, report_reason FROM reports WHERE report_reason LIKE '%spam%' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, user_id, post_id, report_reason FROM reports INNER JOIN actions ON reports.report_id = actions.report_id WHERE actions.action_type = 'resolved' ORDER BY reports.report_date DESC;
SELECT reports.report_id, COUNT(actions.action_id) AS num_actions FROM reports LEFT JOIN actions ON reports.report_id = actions.report_id GROUP BY reports.report_id HAVING num_actions > 0;
SELECT posts.post_id, posts.post_content, COUNT(reports.report_id) AS num_reports FROM posts LEFT JOIN reports ON posts.post_id = reports.post_id GROUP BY posts.post_id ORDER BY num_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM reported_posts;
SELECT post_id, report_reason FROM reported_posts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reports;
SELECT admin_name, admin_role FROM administrators WHERE admin_role = 'Moderator' ORDER BY admin_name ASC;
SELECT post_id, report_reason, report_timestamp FROM reported_posts JOIN reports ON reported_posts.report_id = reports.report_id WHERE reports.report_status = 'pending';
SELECT post_id, user_id, report_reason FROM reported_posts WHERE report_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_status = 'pending' ORDER BY report_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT admin_name, admin_email FROM administrators WHERE admin_role = 'superadmin';
SELECT action_type, action_timestamp FROM actions_taken ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC;

SELECT reported_posts.post_id, reports.report_type, actions_taken.action_type FROM reported_posts INNER JOIN reports ON reported_posts.post_id = reports.post_id INNER JOIN actions_taken ON reports.report_id = actions_taken.report_id WHERE reports.report_status = 'resolved';
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, report_reason FROM reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE is_reported = TRUE;
SELECT report_id, action_taken FROM actions WHERE moderator_id = 5;
SELECT username, email FROM moderators WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, user_id, report_reason FROM reports WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT users.username, reports.report_reason FROM users JOIN reports ON users.user_id = reports.user_id WHERE reports.report_reason LIKE '%spam%';
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE is_reported = TRUE AND post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT moderators.username, actions.action_taken FROM moderators JOIN actions ON moderators.moderator_id = actions.moderator_id ORDER BY actions.action_date DESC LIMIT 10;
